engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: The Town has just recently started forming a committee regarding these funds. Our first step will be to create a survey form for people to complete so our committee will have some direction as to how to proceed.
